1.0.name: wordpress/pushover-notifications
1.0.description:
Using the Pushover Notifcations application on your iOS/Android device in conjunction with your WordPress blog and this plugin, you can be notified of events happening on your blog as Push Notifications on your mobile device.

Currently supports notifications for new users, comments, pingback/trackbacks, user specific password reset notifications, plugin and theme upgrades, and notifying authors of comments on their posts.

You can expand Pushover Notifications for WordPress futher with extensions available at https://wp-push.com/extensions/

This plugin is in no way affiliated with Superblock, LLC (the company behind Pushover.net).

A big thanks to our Trnaslators

  • German: Gero @ http://literaturcafe.de

If you have an interest in translating this plugin visit
